# AdFox

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="360"
  height="400"
  type="adfox"
  data-owner-id="208087"
  data-adfox-params='{"pt": "b","p1": "bsoji","p2": "feil","pct": "a","pfc": "bbhfo","pfb": "cwrtv"}'
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For details on the configuration semantics, please see [AdFox's documentation](https://specs.adfox.ru/page/254/).

### Required parameters

-   `data-owner-id`
-   `data-adfox-params`
